channel.description: Recent content in HIE on Jack's Blog

item.title: Ethics of the Health Information Exchange in the Era of Data Science
item.description: Introduction Health Information Exchanges (HIEs) allow for the transfer and storage of EHR data across institutions, with the primary use of improving patient care (Health IT 2020). The combination of multiple EHRs creates a wealth of data that can also be attractive for secondary uses such as research. Recent advances in machine learning and data science have enabled the analysis of HIE data in unanticipated ways.
